name: Juck's Adventure.
description: One day in a dirty castle, was a potato that suddenly out of nowhere grew, eyes, a mouth, 2 feet, and a consciousness. Juck (the potatoes name) is starving and needs to leave the castle to find food will you help Juck?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    !!WARNING!! this game is extremely buggy and is hard to play, if you want to spend a half of an hour playing a stupid game I made in 2019 go ahead.                                                                         also sorry for no music or sound.
